metadata.title: CVE-2022-1471 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SnakeYaml's Constructor() class does not restrict types which can beinstantiated during deserialization. Deserializing yaml content provided byan attacker can lead to remote code execution. We recommend usingSnakeYaml's SafeConsturctor when parsing untrusted content to restrictdeserialization. We recommend upgrading to version 2.0 and beyond.

criterions.comment: snakeyaml package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
